content: wait this pattern is available for free on my youtube https //youtu be/u8cznsg4cic this listing is for people who would prefer a written pattern with plenty of photos or for those who would like to support me more directly as a creator if you purchase this pattern thank you so much for choosing to support me as a designer you re helping me create more free patterns over on youtube pattern details this adorable stingray works up nice and quickly and only uses some basic stitches in us terms you ll need basic knowledge of single_crochet increase decrease and half_double_crochet half_double_crochet all of which i have tutorials available of how to do each stitch over on my youtube channel bluefoxpaws if you need to have a quick refresher the finished ray should come in at a lovely 7 long from nose to tail and 3 5 wide from fin to fin if you use a 4mm hook like i did this measurement should be accurate you do have permissions to sell the finished product of this pattern as long as credit is given bluefoxpaws
